== Box2D Lua bindings for Lubyk

website for Box2D: http://www.box2d.org
website for lubyk: http://lubyk.org
forum: http://forum.lubyk.org

== Box2D

version: Version 2.1

Box2D is a 2D physics engine for games.

For help with Box2D, please visit http://www.box2d.org. There is a forum there where you may post your questions.

For help with lubyk and Box2D, please visit http://forum.lubyk.org.

== Changes with official Box2D

This version has a new joint "b2BiFrictionJoint".
